details.message: Id is read only and cannot be modified.
Class is read only and cannot be modified.
SubClass is read only and cannot be modified.
CreatedDateTime is read only and should not be set.
GeographicLocation cannot be more than 255 characters.

Status value is incorrect. Valid values are Active, Inactive and Trial.
DisplayName cannot be more than 255 characters.

Type cannot be more than 100 characters.
